products.name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: A comfortable, everyday t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

products.name: Slim Fit Jeans
products.description: These jeans are designed for a modern, slim silhouette with a touch of stretch for ultimate comfort.

products.name: Hooded Sweatshirt
products.description: Stay warm and stylish with this soft fleece-lined hoodie. Features a front pocket and adjustable drawstring hood.

products.description: A lightweight and breathable dress with a vibrant floral print, perfect for sunny days.

products.name: Leather Biker Jacket
products.description: Edgy and timeless, this genuine leather jacket will add a touch of cool to any outfit.

products.name: Basic Crewneck Sweater
products.description: A versatile knit sweater that's perfect for layering. Made from a soft wool blend.

products.name: Wide Leg Trousers
products.description: These stylish trousers feature a wide-leg cut and a high waist for a chic, comfortable look.

products.name: Striped Polo Shirt
products.description: A classic polo shirt with a modern twist, featuring subtle horizontal stripes and a comfortable fit.

products.name: Denim Skirt
products.description: This mini denim skirt is a wardrobe staple, easy to dress up or down for any occasion.

products.name: Winter Parka Coat
products.description: Stay warm in the coldest weather with this insulated parka. Features a faux fur hood and multiple pockets.

products.name: High-Waisted Shorts
products.description: Perfect for summer, these shorts combine a high-waisted fit with a relaxed feel.

products.name: Silk Blouse
products.description: A luxurious and elegant blouse made from 100% pure silk. Perfect for a sophisticated look.

products.name: Pleated Midi Skirt
products.description: This flowy midi skirt features delicate pleats and an elastic waistband for a comfortable, stylish fit.

products.name: Athletic Joggers
products.description: Made from moisture-wicking fabric, these joggers are perfect for workouts or lounging.

products.name: Wool Blend Peacoat
products.description: A classic double-breasted peacoat made from a warm wool blend, perfect for a refined look.

products.name: V-Neck Sweater Dress
products.description: This cozy sweater dress combines warmth with elegance, featuring a flattering V-neckline.

products.name: Graphic Print T-Shirt
products.description: Express your style with this unique graphic t-shirt. Made from soft, breathable cotton.

products.name: Maxi Skirt
products.description: An elegant, full-length maxi skirt that flows beautifully with every step. Perfect for a bohemian look.

products.name: Cargo Shorts

products.name: Classic Trench Coat
